Danny Sullivan , editor-in-chief of technology blog SearchEngineLand.com, said Google's biggest challenges now are to "prove that they've got their Mojo back and that nobody needs to fear them." You have investors and others saying "Gosh, Facebook seems to be doing so well. Why aren't you the hot new thing?" Danny Sullivan said. In a conference call with financial analysts after the announcement that Page would replace Eric Schmidt , co-founder Sergey Brin indicated the company would be putting more effort into the social arena. Budget Cutting Should be Considered
